txt.en: 'We have tracked the forces of Isengard and believe they are ransacking an ancient school, desperately searching for any knowledge related to the making of Rings of Power. We must find this school before them.'
'You must find the School at Tham Mírdain, [placeholder]!'
The Elves of Echad Mirobel have tracked Isengard's forces in Eregion to an ancient school.
Found the School of Tham Mírdain
Find the School of Tham Mírdain
The School of Tham Mírdain can be found in Mirobel, in the south-west region of Eregion.\n\nGelriwen of Echad Mirobel has asked you to find the entrance to an ancient school.
